title: KRK tries to troll Swara Bhaskar and she destroys him with one tweet!
text:
Swara Bhaskar 
Self-proclaimed critic and controversy's favourite child Kamaal R Khan tried to troll Bollywood actress Swara Bhaskar on Twitter with a nasty remark about her upcoming film 'Anaarkali of Aarah'. The actress shut him down like a boss with one tweet!
It all started when Karan Johar released the first look poster of Swara Bhaskar's 'Anaarkali o the tof Aarah' on Twitter. KRK responded to the tweet saying, "Sir @karanjohar it will not be a flop or washout, but it will be super duper disaster of the year coz KRK says so."
Kamaal R Khan 
On noticing KRK's comment, Swara Bhaskar silenced him classily with one tweet. She wrote, "Kuch logon ki gaali, compliment hoti hai! :) (Some people's abuse is a compliment) Thanks @kamaalrkhan the unasked filth u spew is a character certificate for us! Appreciated."
Swara Bhaskar surely showed KRK his place!
